verses.roman:
paṇḍitera gaṇa saba,--bhāgavata dhanya
prāṇa-vallabha--sabāra śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya

synonyms: paṇḍitera—of Gadādhara Paṇḍita; gaṇa—followers; saba—all; bhāgavata dhanya—glorious devotees; prāṇa-vallabha—the heart and soul; sabāra—of all of them; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: All the followers of Gadādhara Paṇḍita are considered great devotees because they have Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu as their life and soul.
